main event: An Air Force officer observed an unidentified flying object at Edwards AFB, California on 6 February 1955.
interesting points: The officer reported seeing a silver round or oval object that made a rapid ascent and descent., The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 5 minutes., The object was initially observed hovering before its rapid movement., The report mentions possible connection with Navy jet aircraft due to the pilot's inexperience., Several pilots and tower operators witnessed another sighting of a bright stationary object on 5 January 1955.
sighted object: a silver round or oval object
